snippet: Prices for many products climbed even as wholesale gasoline costs plummeted 5.8 percent last month.
abstract: Labor Department reports producer price index rose 0.2 percent in October from September; prices for many products increased even as wholesale gasoline costs fell 5.8 percent.
lead_paragraph: Prices for many products climbed even as wholesale gasoline costs plummeted 5.8 percent last month.

headline.main: Producer Prices Edge Up Despite Slide in Cost of Gas
headline.print_headline: Producer Prices Edge Up Despite Slide in Cost of Gas
